Package game.actors.creatures.boss

Class BedOfChaos

java.lang.Object
edu.monash.fit2099.engine.GameEntity

game.actors.creatures.Creature
game.actors.creatures.boss.BedOfChaos
All Implemented Interfaces:
Printable
public class BedOfChaos extends Creature
The BedOfChaos boss. It grows branches or leaves each turn and uses them to heal/increase its attack power.
Author:
Arielle Ocampo

  • Constructor Details

    • BedOfChaos

      public BedOfChaos(NPCController controller)
      Creates a BedOfChaos. Adds an intrinsic weapon, an AttackBehaviour, and a GrowBehaviour.
      Parameters:
      controller - controller for this boss

  • Method Details

    • grow

      public void grow(Display display)
      Performs growth for the boss: -Grows a new branch or a new leaf (50/50 chance). -Calls grow() on each existing growable before this turn.
      Parameters:
      display - display used to print messages

    • getTotalAttackPower

      public int getTotalAttackPower()
      Returns total attack power for the boss’s weapon, calculated by base attack + each growable's attack amount.
      Returns:
      total attack power
